'''"Summer Forest Banquet"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Summer Forest Banquet" is obtainable by buying the Gnostic Chorus package of the [[Battle Pass/Marine Hues|Marine Hues]] Battle Pass.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 16h
|Pine Wood = 6
|Birch Wood = 6
|sort = Pine Wood
}}
